website_summaries.verdict: Warm and comfortable hiking socks with superior Merino wool blend. These socks offer all the elements of comfort and are made to last.
pros: A popular choice for hiking enthusiasts
Thick enough for comfort yet flexible with movement
An unbeatable price for socks with 71% Merino wool
cons: These socks may stretch after repeated wear

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these socks for my husband about 2 years ago and he has loved them; they’ve held up well even though he throws them in the dryer! Based on this, I ordered the small to medium size for myself. They’re incredibly soft and just thick enough to make my 74 yo, skinny, achy feet very comfortable in my hiking shoes. HOWEVER, within the package of 4 pair, they vary greatly in size from very small (hope they don’t shrink!) to having a very large toe area. Not pleased with product control!
customer_reviews.author: Crozetian

customer_reviews.title: Confusing sizes, and wears away really fast.
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm a wildland firefighter, and I was hoping to use these for deployments. First, I'm a size 9.5 men's. Because there was a 9.5 option for the small and large, I had to take the risk and flip a coin. I purchased the smaller size which was labeled for 9.5 and they're too small. So I tried them out for a day, and by the end of my 24 hour shift at the station, I already had a hole on my toes. I'm very dissatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MrFreeze

customer_reviews.title: but they're a whole lot better than regular gold toe/hanes
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because of value. These are much thinner than your standard smartwool/REI/LL Bean merino wool socks, and they don't stay up nearly as well, but they're a whole lot better than regular gold toe/hanes. For $5 per pair, instead of $12-18, the sacrifice in quality is more than worth it. Now I can wear wool socks every day in the winter instead of rationing my three pairs of $18 socks to myself between laundry loads.
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My foot is 9.5 wide, and these were a bit too snug. i gave these to my wife to wear around the house. Awesome product though. i have anohter set of Large size and those are a perfect fit for my foot. Lasted a long time for me (well over a year of continuous use)
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socks!! I can't say enough great things about these. They wick your sweat away, keep your feet warm, and keeps the odor out. I have taken these on multiple hiking trips and I DO reccomend them to my family and friends. Excellent product. Make sure you tumble dry them. I haven't made that mistake yet and don't want to. I wash them in the washer (cold) and dry them on tumble. Haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, but be wary of sizes sent
customer_reviews.text: My husband already owns a few pairs and is happy with them. Ordered 2 packages of 4 pairs two different sizes. One was correct- large for my husband. The other which was supposed to be small/medium was 2 pairs small/medium and 2 pairs large. Needed them now so can’t return. Guess my husband gets 6 pairs, but I’m hesitant to order more for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Too bad this company went off the deep end
customer_reviews.text: Too bad this company went off the deep end. They use to be almost all wool and really warm. Now they are almost all spandex and sized to fit very skinny undersized dwarf's. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William Senk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and fabulous Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Amazing quality, and Fabulous price. I used them and wash them several times and they still look like new. I used them in very cold weather and very hot weather and they kept my fit dry and neutral temperature. Is mazing! I didn't have cold or ether hot .
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They work great!!! This is a great product! I wore them in weather that was cool, but not sure cold. Went to Colorado and it wasn't cold during the day, but at night it got into the 20's. My feet sweated just a bit during the day, but it didn't matter, they seemed to just dry on there own as the day wore on and the temperature dropped. I like that I could wear them through the change in temperature and I never had cold feet. There a must have in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and warm socks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought winter socks from multiple stores/sites and I always have an issue with them. Not these socks! They are super comfortable, not constricting and hold up well in the wash (I don't put them in the dryer). They keep my feet warm in 30 degree weather and aren't too thick so I can wear comfortably in a boot. Highly recommend these socks!
customer_reviews.author: Oriana Bruno

customer_reviews.title: While the wool is extra soft and makes my feet feel super good, it just CANNOT do what a product ...
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say that I don't have much experience with socks. I was thinking about giving this one 4 stars earlier. While the wool is extra soft and makes my feet feel super good, it just CANNOT do what a product like smartwool can: keeping your feet, at the same time, warm. Right, my feet was freezing wearing this, and in the same situation, smartwool kept my super fine. However, the fit is very good. I do like it. Nice and soft touch, came with great thickness (that unfortunately can't keep you from cold).
customer_reviews.author: wpubpanon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Socks
customer_reviews.text: Best socks I’ve ever owned. I like them better than some Darn Tough socks I bought. They are warm not to thick and your feet don’t sweat in them. I wore them with boots all winter and am impressed. They look like brand new. I don’t know how they will be for warmer weather but from September until April they are perfect. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Feel good but are falling apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: A couple socks out of the pack I ordered started balling up and getting huge runs after just a single washing, others are starting to suffer the same fate after just a couple washes. They're nice and thick and fit right but I have serious doubts regarding their longevity. Based on my initial experience I'll probably be going back to Kirkland Signature which are just slightly less thick but have proven to be long lasting and durable. Edit after having them for a while, it looks like there were just a couple bad ones in the bunch, the rest of the order is holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: jbauch357

customer_reviews.title: Great sock, I'm glad I stumbled across these.  My new favorite.
customer_reviews.text: The size and fit of these were perfect for me. I have smaller feet that usually make the other brand sock ranges a little too broad. At first I didn't like the compression fit around the base of the foot, but I am getting used to it, and it is not too tight like some other socks I've tried where the compression actually fatigued my feet. I've only worn these on a few hikes, but so far so good. They keep my feet warm, dry and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TechDealShopper

customer_reviews.title: Weak elastic
customer_reviews.text: After one wash the elastic strands at the top are already breaking and poking out of the sock.
customer_reviews.author: Love a good find

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than I expected. Top band is a little tight on my leg but overall comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KAL

customer_reviews.title: Best wool socks EVER
customer_reviews.text: Essential cold weather gear. I've had these for two winters and expect to get several more winters out of them. I wear wool socks almost every day in the winter. These are my go-to socks. Never an issue with cold toes. No spots where they are starting to get thin. Overall great socks.
customer_reviews.author: No hill for a high stepper

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mens size for my husband and woman's size for myself; however, I wish the womans size weren't such short crew socks because after a long day, they tend to fall around my ankle. I accidentally wore a pair of my husbands socks and they were the perfect length but the foot portion was big (of course) so I found those to be a tad more comfortable. I do appreciate the warmth of these. In this Bavarian weather they keep my feet somewhat warm with my Sorel boots; however they aren't completely HOT. They're just warm.
customer_reviews.author: KB Casey

customer_reviews.title: Too big in the toe box causes uncomfortable fit with boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks after researching for the warmest socks for my trip to Iceland. Washed them before I left so they’d be ready to put right on. The problem is that these socks are way too bulky and do not fit snuggly in the toe box area. Therefore when you put your boots on, all the extra material causes socks to bunch up and creates an uncomfortable and unpleasant fit. In my opinion the socks needs to be more fitted for a more comfortable fit when wearing shoes/boots. If I hadn’t washed, I would return. I never ended up wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Trigiani

customer_reviews.title: I like these socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these socks, I'm a 9 1/2 shoe size got the small mediums and they fit a little small. I would definitely go with large next time if you would like them to cover your calf mid way. (my calfs are small and they s/m socks are alittle tight....i'll post picks of my calfs for scale later)((i have been working out so my calfs are not That small) good quality as always.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great For Hiking
customer_reviews.text: I spent a month in the desert hiking for HOURS every day!! up and down mountain ranges and these socks are WOW! I had blisters and that crazy schist, but the thickness of these socks made my feets happy and comfortable to walk again.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina L

customer_reviews.title: Raves! Repeat buyer, look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer! Warm, comfortable, don’t slide down, holding up very well (bought more for others) for at least a year. Refreshing when you find a product that’s just right!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for hiking in Iceland and I love them. I have worn them now in both ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hiking in Iceland and I love them. I have worn them now in both cold and hot weather for hiking and they are amazing: lots of cushion, breathable, moisture wicking. Very comfortable with my hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! A lighter merino wool sock for 3 season hiking and for work. I've heavier socks for winter. These fit great in my boots and trail running shoes. They feel wonderful! The only question is their durability which time will tell. But, People Socks stand behind their product. I can update my review after some time to see how well they wear.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: I have a concern even though they fit well and look just fine
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started wearing these socks, but I am concerned that the first time of wearing, they were losing fabric into those little rolls of micro-fabric that sit on the socks regular fabric when they are wearing out too fast. The socks look good, feel comfortable, but I will only be able to say after they have been worn and washed a lot more that the first week after I received them.
customer_reviews.author: BobY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have super-skinny ankles and narrow feet and still could barely get these on! Back they went.
customer_reviews.author: Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a quality product so far. Warm and comfortable. I can't speak for longevity/durability as I haven't had them that long. That being said they seem to be of reasonable quality for the price and the fit and finish seem good. I wash them inside out in the machine and hang to dry. Happy they are made in USA. I came back to buy more but they were out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppah617

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet in very cold conditions and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully warm feet after hours working in freezer. Perfect fit for women, no too long foot issues nor too small. Stays up under work boots. Holds up very well. Caution these are best for cold conditions. In hot weather you will have HOT feet. Remain comfortable after all day use and I will definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, soft, warm!
customer_reviews.text: Warm, soft, wash/dries well. Good fit, not too short but comes perfect length above ankles, so that when sitting with pants on, there’s no bare skin between the sock and pant hem.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Egan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for good quality warm socks and these fit the bill. They are super soft and comfortable and keep my feet warm in 20 degree weather without overheating my feet on warmer days.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a stocking stuffer for my wife. She has worn them every week this winter. She loves the warmth and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Phil D Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great! These pill quicker than any other wool sock ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a pair of cotton socks in years. I decided to try something more affordable. I am a man with a size 8.5-9 and bought the womans size. Fit is great! These pill quicker than any other wool sock I've owned, and I have some that are long over due for being thrown out that are less pilled than a few washes of these. That said, I will buy again. The price is right. But needs more color options.
customer_reviews.author: atoms

customer_reviews.title: American Quality
customer_reviews.text: Doubt I will ever wear any other sock. I will be ordering more to replace all my other socks. These socks are the most comfortable and durable I have worn. The merino wool is great! I won't be wearing cotton any more. The toe seam feels like it's not even there and the socks don't stretch out after a long work day like cotton does. Wouldn't expect anything less from an American made product. Kudos to People Socks! You have a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm but small
customer_reviews.text: Great socks but a little smaller that I expected. I'm in between sizes (shoe size 9.5) and so the large was probably too big. That said, my main complaint is that they do not come up very far on my calf. I suppose the larger ones would be longer but then they'd be too big on my feet. Comfy and warm but sizing is not great for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Psi 5

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for cold and wet camping
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic socks, just went camping in cold rainy weather. My feet stayed dry and warm while the rest of me was soaked. Granted I had good rain boots but walking in my soul pad everything was moist because it was condensation and nonstop hard rain for 3 days and I would step on rain drops with just the socks on and it absorbed everything and my toes still stayed dry and warm. Really great socks. My husband was jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I believe the socks are not sized adequately (runs large) and the importance of good fitting socks is key to good foot health
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on these, I have purchased 8 pairs and I do not believe the description of the socks in the sellers adds are completely accurate. I believe the socks are not sized adequately (runs large) and the importance of good fitting socks is key to good foot health. They also have a lot of fuzz when you first wash them so be sure to wash separately. I know I will not purchase again - sorry. I am looking for quality as a consumer, tired of mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: No Bull

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you want amazing socks.
customer_reviews.text: At this point these are the best socks I have ever owned. Fits well with a nice cushion. Helps avoid smelly feet. Breathes well. Can’t recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for miles
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable socks I have ever worn! Just keep in mind the washing instructions. Turn them inside out to put in the washer but do not put in the dryer unless your children need socks
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: They're not 100% wool and you can tell once you've been wearing them a while but after multiple washes they are still in great c
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly! I needed something for the winter in a cold apartment and these work so well. I use them constantly with my ankle boots and they are just the right height. They're not 100% wool and you can tell once you've been wearing them a while but after multiple washes they are still in great condition with very little wear or pilling showing.
customer_reviews.author: seoh22

customer_reviews.title: ... a recent trip to Mammoth Mountain and they were comfortable, yet kept my feet nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: Wore this with Winter boots during a recent trip to Mammoth Mountain and they were comfortable, yet kept my feet nice and toasty. Based on some reviewer's concern about shrinkage, I didn't let them get too hot in the dryer...took them out when about 70% dry and hung them up to finish. They still fit perfectly (I got Small-Medium and I wear a 9.5M shoe).
customer_reviews.author: Santa Barbara Gal

customer_reviews.title: Go-to winter socks!
customer_reviews.text: Quality winter socks! Wear these all winter long. Repeat buyer, only for quantity. The socks last
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome socks
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I wear my husband’s socks to bed every night, so finally broke down and got my own set of People Socks. Nice, thick, and they last. Hang to dry!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Great price! Easy care!
customer_reviews.text: After "borrowing" these from my daughter (who purchased the for a two month hiking experience in two different climates: tropical & snow), I purchased my won set and LOVE them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Love they are made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and keep my toes warm! The colors are very similar and I almost can't tell them a part which makes matching harder. Next time I’d get all one color. I wash as recommended and hang dry. I’m hoping to get another year or 2 out of them.
customer_reviews.author: UGAgirl06

customer_reviews.title: Rough uncomfortable material.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these I find they seem to cause more blisters due to the roughness of the material. Not sure I will wear them for long hikes at all. They also wear in places after a couple of hikes almost holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great warm socks
customer_reviews.text: I wore these with just regular thin socks underneath and my snow boots, kept my feet warm and toasty the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: They are very thick and warm, I had to wear them a time or two to get used to them. They did make my feet a little sweaty at first.
customer_reviews.author: christi clifford

customer_reviews.title: if you have a bad back. I do not have large feet either
customer_reviews.text: Too hard/tight to put on esp. if you have a bad back. I do not have large feet either.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Good Value..
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, reasonably priced and Made In USA! I bought medium thick ones and keeps my feet warm in cold weather (around 35 degree F). Did not try in extreme cold conditions like sub-zero. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice socks! Haven’t done any hiking or anything like that yet, but day to day they are great! Will definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves 'em!
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy Columbia merino wool lite hiking socks. Everyday wear for us. My wife liked the touch of these socks right out of the bag. Columbia's start balling up after wearing. We wash them inside out...no dryer...still ball up. Hope the PS's don't! Time will tell. But, as for now....we're happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Solerider

customer_reviews.title: Amazing socks.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socks. Thick and comfy ! Will shrink a bit after first wash. But amazing quality !
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Soft.  Warm.  Wears fast.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cushion and warmth. Socks wear through too fast at my big toe nail. All my other similar socks don't do so, they get threadbare on the heel and ball and last twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Norris

customer_reviews.title: They were very comfortable. Only buy these if you are going to ...
customer_reviews.text: These kept my feet extremely warm in below freezing. They were very comfortable. Only buy these if you are going to be in below freezing weather, otherwise, your feet will most likely be too hot in these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: Great wool socks
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I recently moved to a colder climate and have been wearing them every day. They're thick and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable socks. I've only owned them for a few weeks, so unsure about their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hiking socks
customer_reviews.text: I needed thick wool hiking socks for my journeys in Bryce Canyon Nation Park, Zion National Park, and the hike down and up out of the Grand Canyon. These socks were fantastic! They are fast drying, didn’t lock in gross odor, and left me blister free!
customer_reviews.author: Loren A

customer_reviews.title: comfortable hiking socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks as I was going to be working at a construction site in China and wanted something comfortable on my feet with my hiking boots. I gave them a 4 because they're not AS soft as the socks I bought with the boots at Big 5.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a cruise to Alaska. Kept our feet warm and dry on several excursions. Would buy again. Washed on delicate and hung to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. A great item for a gift. How could someone not like these awesome socks?
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lepper

customer_reviews.title: Keep your feet warm in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for my daughter. She absolutely loves them. A friend bought them when I told her about them and she loves them also. Very reasonable price for wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: AH
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like them. Feet were super sweaty and not at all soft
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted, but they didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: These socks were comfortable and warm but developed holes in the soles after one winter’s worth of wear (in rotation with other socks). I purchased them expecting to get more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: kmbreads

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I walk miles a day for work, and appreciate good socks. These fit very well, and seem to be good quality. Hope they hold up! I have a slightly wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard John Nagel

customer_reviews.title: SmartWool Quality at a People Socks Price
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to buy socks that are comparable to SmartWool, but half the price. Highly recommend these socks!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyPTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: They keep my feet warm in the hammock.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for keeping my feet warm on cold nights at the camp, in the hammock. They are very warm. My foot is a size 9 and the medium small fits snug. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: My feet were nice and warm in my waterproof boots
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my trip to Iceland. My feet were nice and warm in my waterproof boots, and the socks were so soft and cushioned. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite socks. They are a little on the thick side so be sure to wear your shoes that are like a half size bigger than your normal size for perfect comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because I knew that they were flea proof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I knew that they were flea proof! My apartment complex has something to be desired... And flees cannot get through the tiny little holes in these socks!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Valley

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very nice and quite thick. I wear a women's size 7. They barely fit me and I have not washed them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Macro Betty

customer_reviews.title: ... yourself and a pair for your girlfriend she will love you forever
customer_reviews.text: Buy a pair for yourself and a pair for your girlfriend she will love you forever.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great value for the price. I own several different pairs and brands of wool socks and rank these among some of the best I own.
customer_reviews.author: James U.

customer_reviews.title: Great winter socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks. They stay up without cutting off your circulation. They don't shrink in the washer and dryer (low temp setting). They are perfect, everyday socks for those of us who live through Minnesota winters.
customer_reviews.author: MNGRRRL

customer_reviews.title: I loved these socks
customer_reviews.text: I loved these socks. The socks seem to be good quality. They are quite thick and warm. I bought them for a trip I was taking to Iceland to keep my feet warm and dry. They did just that. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: yeaokbro

customer_reviews.title: Good socks. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good socks. Comfortable, decent price. You can probably find cheaper but these are well made and supposedly made in the US.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Not sure they have the "arch support" that they claim, but they are excellently warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wells

customer_reviews.title: #1 Firefighter sock
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! my boyfriend loves them asked me to order 8 more pairs. Buy fir a firefighter, avid hiker, forestry workers, rock climbers, or for anyone who loves the outdoors. This is a great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBO

customer_reviews.title: Cozy socks, but not as durable as darn tough
customer_reviews.text: I usually reach for these socks first. They're super cozy. But they wear out faster than darn tough.
customer_reviews.author: Loi

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for hiking or work
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Not to heavy. Soft. Be sure to read up on how to wash them so they last.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M A

customer_reviews.title: The first pair I bought were great in large
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought were great in large. The second pair a year later the same sock was too short!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Lodato

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These socks were perfect for a cold -8 degree trip. There's nothing worse then cold feet and these were a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Knag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GARMENT GOOD AND GOOD TECHNOLOGY. I LIKE IT ALOT. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable socks, seem sturdy. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: kept me warm but show wear pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm and comfortable, but after wearing began showing signs of wear and piling.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie S

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm socks, wash up great, and hold up well. We use these for camping and they work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I don't have the best circulation in the world, and my extremities can get quite cold. They are more than adequate to keep my feet warm without getting overly sweaty. They are thick, but not too thick to fit into my shoes. I wear a men's size 8 shoe, and the small/medium size fits me just fine. After having owned them for quite some time, they have retained their elasticity, and there hasn't been very much in the way of pilling. I would buy these again, and have.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Richardson

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent for skiing
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for skiing. Will keep your feet warm and dry and are comfortable to boot. My wife keeps stealing them from me. Only thing I regret is getting more than one color. Makes it slightly aggravating to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Not for Women
customer_reviews.text: These socks should not be advertised as Unisex. I ordered a sm/med and I wear an 8-8 1/2 shoe size and the socks bunch up in my shoes and "overflow the heel". I washed one pair in warm water and dried on high heat and they still are WAY too big. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Kay

customer_reviews.title: Seem like decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem like decent quality, though maybe a little bit thin. I could definitely see these wearing thin in the heel area. For the price, though, and considering the high percentage of wool in them, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A2Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sox! I always have cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sox! I always have cold feet, these socks a comfy and warm. I have size 6 women's feet, so I washed them and put them in the dryer for 15 minutes so they would fit.
customer_reviews.author: ng

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as described and reviewed
customer_reviews.text: While these socks were sturdy, I did not find them to be soft enough to wear for hours. I returned them without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reads

customer_reviews.title: Winter Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet (size 5) and my bf has 8.5 and it fits both of our feet just fine with mine fitting just slightly looser. The socks are thicker so it might be snug on you if your shoes are already fitted. It's definitely great for the winter!
customer_reviews.author: S.H

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Like these socks a lot. So soft. Fit great with my hiking shoes. I wear a 7 1/2 to 8 shoe. I thought the shoes would be to tight but the socks fit very well with the socks! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swinny

customer_reviews.title: You can hike the Grand Canyon
customer_reviews.text: Hikes the Grand Canyon in these and they worked great! The extra cushion they provide definitely helped!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love the socks
customer_reviews.text: I love the socks, they are cozy and comfy and keep my fit warm and dry. They run a little small but nothing bad. I wear size 9 nike and after a few wash they shrink a little but still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Myself, wife and daughter very happy with them, warm, thin and nice colors
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I buy these over and over and use them all winter. Love these socks.
customer_reviews.author: D.DeVries

customer_reviews.title: These are Winter Socks
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for light-weight wool socks, these are not it. Also, if you have a size 9 shoe, go with the larger one if you prefer to spend less than 45 seconds putting a sock on.
customer_reviews.author: David McQuain

customer_reviews.title: Great Cushion to wear with my Teva sandals and hike ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Cushion to wear with my Teva sandals and hike 12 hours. I didn't prefer them for my boots, too warm in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Salt

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these socks!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an outdoorsman and helicopter mechanic. He asks for these socks. He says they are the best boot socks he has ever worn. He lives in lace up boots.
customer_reviews.author: LAV

product_meta.title: PEOPLE SOCKS Men's Women's Merino wool crew socks 4 pairs 71% premium with Arch support Made in USA
product_meta.description:
Quality You Can Feel 

Are you tired of supposedly premium wool socks that tend to fall apart within a year? 
Do you want the comfort and durability of merino wool on your feet, but you don’t want to pay an arm and a leg? 
Are you new to the world of wool socks and you just want something that will keep you comfortable and odor/sweat free all day? 

Experience Premium Merino Wool at a Bargain Price with People Socks! 

We designed these socks to be everyday wear – not too thick, not too thin. We also reinforced the toe and heel so they won’t wear out on you as quickly as some wool socks can. 

Why People Socks? 

Since we started in 2012, we’ve been on a mission to make merino wool socks affordable and bring them to you in a sustainable manner We wanted to knit in the USA and found a way. Typically, you’ll pay around $18 a pair for high-quality merino wool socks; with us you’ll pay a small fraction of that -- around $5-$9, and they’re made right here in North Carolina to our exacting standards. 

The People’s Promise 

It’s simple: We want you to be happy people. It’s our way of ensuring you get your money’s worth every time you buy from us. 

Give The Gift of People Socks 

It seems like every day we hear from someone who had never tried wool socks before buying from us, and they’re totally blown away by the superior comfort, sweat and odor control compared to cotton. So if you know someone who could stand to make the switch, our socks make a wonderful gift. The lucky recipient will be thanking you again and again for setting them straight in the sock world. 

So scroll back up, choose your size and color, and enjoy merino wool on your feet at a price that can’t be beat!
feature_bullets: 71% Merino Wool ,21% Nylon, 7% Poly,1% Spandex. Reinforced Toe & Heel.
Wash and then Air-dry ( to avoid shrinkage) but socks snap back in to shape.
